attributes.action: extradite all non - UK citizens to another or their country of origin, even if they are asylum - seekers, who commit a felony and / or criminal act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is privilege to be invited to be a guest in another nation's country - so why, given this chance do certain individuals destroy the trust and bite  the hand that feeds them ?

If ethnic communities are hoping to live peacefully in society, there are better ways than conducting acts of atrocity, making threats of barbarism and being generally disruptive. As a British citizen, I find it OFFENSIVE to be claiming from the British Welfare State, using British public services whilst waging terror on fellow subjects, heckling senior politicians and declaring the Head of State "an enemy".

We the undersigned all want respect for differences, freedom and religious tolerance, but urge the P.M. to establish a statutory mandate to deal with those who apparently do not.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
